variable.name: SOCA1A
variable.description: Q1a. First, are you married, separated, divorced, widowed or have you never been married? [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA1B
variable.description: Q1b. How long have you been married, separated, divorced, widowed or have you never been married? (years) [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA2
variable.description: Q2. Are you currently living with your spouse or another person in an intimate relationship? [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA3
variable.description: Q3. How much does (did) your husband/wife/partner/person you live with make you feel loved and cared for? [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA4
variable.description: Q4. How much do you feel makes too many demands on you? [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA5
variable.description: Q5. How many close friends can you talk to? [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA6
variable.description: Q6. How many relatives are you close to? [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA7
variable.description: Q7. Number of friends or relatives you see once per month [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA8A
variable.description: Q8a. Do you belong to any social, recreational, work, church or other community groups? [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]

variable.name: SOCA8B
variable.description: Q8b. Do you belong to any social, recreational, work, church or other community groups? What is the total number of groups you belong to [Visit1] [Social Support Form, SOC]
